title: How Your Financial Habits Create Data
instructions: Reflect on your daily financial habits and answer the following questions. Then list 2–3 types of data that your actions created.

questions.question: Did you make any purchases today? If yes, what did you buy and how did you pay?
Did you check any financial app today? If yes, which one?
Did you save or invest anything today?
List 2–3 types of data your financial activities created today.
